quoteText:
CyberNet, in its sole discretion, may terminate your use and access of its services at any time and for any reason, or no reason if it believes you have violated any of the terms of use.
Any termination may occur without notice to you and CyberNet may immediately deactivate or delete your account.
title: The service can delete your account without prior notice and without a reason

tosdr.case: The service can delete your account without prior notice and without a reason
